mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (email, pw, phone, service_yn, reg_dt) VALUE( #{email}, #{pw}, #{phone}, #{serviceYn}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO BUSINESS (user_id, business_num, business_name, business_type, business_ingre, business_cookway, business_already, business_staff, business_size, business_start, business_end, reg_dt) VALUE( #{userId}, #{businessNum}, #{businessName}, #{businessType}, #{businessIngre}, #{businessCookway}, #{businessAlready}, #{businessStaff}, #{businessSize}, #{businessStart}, #{businessEnd}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM USER WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT COUNT(0) CNT FROM USER WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT COUNT(0) CNT FROM BUSINESS WHERE business_num = #{businessNum}

SELECT A.user_id, A.email, A.pw, A.phone, A.service_yn, B.business_num, B.business_name, B.business_type, B.business_ingre, B.business_cookway, B.business_already, B.business_staff, B.business_size, B.business_start, B.business_end FROM USER A INNER JOIN BUSINESS B ON A.user_id = B.user_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId}
